LanguageData.MakeFruitYogurt.label: 制作水果酸奶
LanguageData.MakeFruitYogurt.description: Cook yogurts from milk or soy milk and some fruits. Produces 3.
LanguageData.MakeFruitYogurt_Bulk.label: 批量制作水果酸奶
LanguageData.MakeFruitYogurt_Bulk.description: Cook yogurts from milk or soy milk and some fruits. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeChocoMilk.label: 调制巧克力牛奶
LanguageData.MakeChocoMilk.description: Mix milk or soy milk with chocolate for tastier beverages. Produces 3.
LanguageData.MakeChocoMilk_Bulk.label: 批量调制巧克力牛奶
LanguageData.MakeChocoMilk_Bulk.description: Mix milk or soy milk with chocolate for tastier beverages. Produces 10.
LanguageData.BrewTea.label: 沏茶
LanguageData.BrewTea.description: Prepare tea leaves and brew them into cups of tea. Produces 3.
LanguageData.BrewCoffee.label: 煮咖啡
LanguageData.BrewCoffee.description: Brews cups of coffee. Don't overdose on caffeine! Produces 5.
LanguageData.MakeFruitDrink.label: 榨制水果饮料
LanguageData.MakeFruitDrink.description: Press fruit to 制造 some tasty fruit drinks. Produces 3.
